title: Network Pharmacology Approach to Unveiling the Mechanism of Wolfberry Mulberry Raspberry Decoction in the Treatment of Sepsis-Induced Myocardial Dysfunction.
abstract: To investigate the mechanisms by which the Wolfberry Mulberry Raspberry Decoction (WMRD) affects Sepsis-Induced Myocardial Dysfunction (SIMD) using network pharmacology and experimental validation.
